props.description:
Display mode for the time picker panel.
- "scroll": Shows a scroll-based wheel picker with separate hour/minute columns.
- "dropdown": Shows a single scrollable list of time options.
props.title: mode

props.description:
Current time value (HH:mm string format or Date object).
For 12h format, use "HH:mm AM/PM" or just "HH:mm" (will default to AM).
props.title: value

props.description: Callback fired when the time changes.
props.title: onChange

props.description:
Step interval in minutes for the time picker.
For scroll mode: controls minute increments in the minutes column.
For dropdown mode: controls the time options shown in the list.
Common values: 1, 15, 30, 60.
props.title: step

props.description: Placeholder text for the input field.
props.title: placeholder

props.description: Controls the open state of the picker panel (controlled mode).
props.title: open

props.description: Callback fired when the panel open state changes.
props.title: onOpenChange

props.description: Accessible label for the time picker input.
props.title: aria-label

props.description: ID of an element that labels the time picker.
props.title: aria-labelledby

props.description: ID of an element that describes the time picker.
props.title: aria-describedby

props.description: Name attribute for the hidden input (for form submission).
props.title: name

props.description: ID attribute for the input element.
props.title: id

props.description:
